title: Veganity Foods
typeOfFood: Vegan, American, Organic, Fast food, Delivery, Take-out
description: A 100% vegan take away with a weekly changing menu that can include fruit/vegetable juices, soups, salads and burgers made-in-house daily using fresh durable and organic ingredients. When possible, all ingredients are free of gluten, sugar and artificial additives. Based on take away and delivery with limited seating available.
